home.trytoday: Get in touch and we will assist you
home.tellus: Tell us about your business and services
about.title: About us
about.introduction: Was founded by the dedication of experienced lawyers and legal experts. Our company is one of the prestigious units specializing in consulting services: Business, Real Estate, Investment – Project. Since our establishment, we have helped a lot of clients successfully solve difficulties and problems about the legal issues they encounter. The trust of customers when using our services during the past time is the most clear affirmation of the brand that we have always strived to build.
about.vision: Hung Viet is making continuous efforts to become one of the prestigious law consultancy firms in Vietnam in 2025 in the field of business, investment.
about.mission: Positive changes in business and investment activities of the business, minimizing risks. Ensuring the safety in civil, commercial, investment transactions and protecting rights of businesses, organizations and individuals.
about.integrityContent: We always place utmost importance on customers, we ensure to fulfill our commitments to customers and partners with all of our enthusiasm.
about.wisdomContent: We believe that “Wisdom is an invaluable asset”, we uphold the spirit of “Dare to think, dare to do” to develop the business.
about.credibilityContent: We consider building Credibility as our guiding principle, we always ensure true commitment to customers and partners and vigorously protect Credibility as protecting our honor.
